definition: رهق rahiqa a (rahaq) to come over s.o. or s.th. (هـ, ه), overtake (هـ, ه s.o., s.th.) III to approach (هـ an age); to approach the age of sexual maturity; to be adolescent IV to bring down (هـ ه upon s.o. s.th.), make (ه s.o.) undergo or suffer (هـ s.th.); to oppress, burden, overburden (ه s.o., ب with s.th.), lie heavily, bear down (ه on s.o.) │ارهقه جذبا (jadban) to tug at s.o. violently or too violently
